description: I have been working with HTML since I learned XHTML in 2010. I am very proficient in HTML5 and have lots of experience creating websites from scratch with no frameworks or development tools.
I have built many web pages using CSS for styling. This page uses CSS3 transitions and transforms for effects.
JavaScript has been used in many of my projects for form validation. I have also used JavaScript for slide-shows and other features not possible with HTML5 or CSS3.
I commonly incorporate Ajax into my projects alongside PHP. I do this by calling a PHP script via Ajax to query a database and update page content.
JQuery is used in almost all my projects. Although I prefer Twitter Bootstrap for page layout, JQuery is helpful for adding widgets, simplifying JavaScript code, and creating animations.
I have built various sites that utilize PHP server side scripting to query databases and run C.R.U.D. operations.
I am currently learning AngularJS in order to build front end web apps that require less requests to the server.
I used the C programming language to code a simple bash shell for UNIX operating systems. The shell ran basic commands such as 'ls' and 'mv'. A linked list was used for job control.
I am proficient in Visual Studio and have built web sites using the ASP.NET framework. C# was used on the back-end along with a Microsoft Access database to store data.
I have experience building Java GUI applications that implement Object Oriented design concepts.
I am most familiar with Ubuntu and know how to operate the system from the command shell.
I have built and used MYSQL databases. SQL commands were executed on the database using PHP scripts..
